name: 社長
text:
お前が忙しいのはわかっている
時間が無い中でよく頑張ってくれているとも思う
trans:
I already know that you're busy,
You always worked your hardest during your free time.

name: 社長
text: だが、忙しさを言い訳にするのは違うだろう
trans: But it would be different to make "being busy" an excuse.

name: 社長
text:
より効率的に業務を進められないか、考えたのか？
流されるままに仕事をしていては、一流とは言えないぞ
trans: Try working efficiently, wouldn't that be better? If you kept working as you were being swept away, that wouldn't be nice.
